ow.routing.frtchord
クラス FRTChord

java.lang.Object
  ow.routing.impl.AbstractRoutingAlgorithm
      ow.routing.frtchord.FRTChord
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
RoutingAlgorithm
public final class FRTChord
extends AbstractRoutingAlgorithm

A RoutingAlgorithm implementing FRT-Chord.

メソッドの詳細

reset

public void reset()
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Reset the routing table.

stop

public void stop()
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Stops this instance. This method is called by RoutingService#stop() and an application usually does not have to call this method directly.

suspend

public void suspend()
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Suspends this instance.

resume

public void resume()
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Resumes this instance after suspended.

initialRoutingContext

public RoutingContext initialRoutingContext(ID targetID)
クラス AbstractRoutingAlgorithm の記述:
The default implementation of initialRoutingContext().

定義:
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm 内の initialRoutingContext
オーバーライド:
クラス AbstractRoutingAlgorithm 内の initialRoutingContext
戻り値:
initial routing context. null if this algorithm does not use RoutingContext.

distance

public java.math.BigInteger distance(ID to,
                                     ID from)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Returns the distance between given two IDs.

パラメータ:
to - target.
from - starting point.

join

public void join(IDAddressPair[] neighbors)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
This method is called on the joining node. Note that the first element of the given neighbors is the responsible node for the ID of this node.

パラメータ:
neighbors - nodes which should be closest from the joining node itself.

nextHopCandidates

public IDAddressPair[] nextHopCandidates(ID target,
                                         ID lastHop,
                                         boolean joining,
                                         int maxNumber,
                                         RoutingContext cxt)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Returns candidates for the next hop for the specified target ID. The number of candidates is the given number or less than it. The candidates may include the calling node itself. This method should update the given RoutingContext instance. Note that all returned nodes are not always alive.

responsibleNodeCandidates

public IDAddressPair[] responsibleNodeCandidates(ID target,
                                                 int maxNumber)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Returns candidates for the responsible node for the specified target ID. In other words, the nodes are "neighbors" onto which this node replicates key-value pairs. Note that the returned candidates should include the responsible node itself.

touch

public void touch(IDAddressPair from)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Notifies the algorithm that a node is alive. For example, this method should be called when an packet was come from it.

forget

public void forget(IDAddressPair node)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
The algorithm instance forgets the specified node.

toReplace

public boolean toReplace(IDAddressPair existingEntry,
                         IDAddressPair newEntry)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Judges an existing entry to be replaced with the specified new entry in the routing table. This method is used internally in each algorithm and not required to be in this interface.

join

public void join(IDAddressPair joiningNode,
                 IDAddressPair lastHop,
                 boolean isFinalNode)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Notifies the algorithm instance of a joining node. This method is called on every node along the joining route.

パラメータ:
joiningNode - an IDAddressPair of the joining node.
lastHop - the last hop of this node. possibly null.
isFinalNode - true if this node is the final node on the route.

getRoutingTableString

public java.lang.String getRoutingTableString(int verboseLevel)
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Returns a String representation of the routing table.

getRoutingTableHTMLString

public java.lang.String getRoutingTableHTMLString()
インタフェース RoutingAlgorithm の記述:
Returns a String representation of the routing table.

prepareHandlers

public void prepareHandlers()
